sentences.sContent: A nucleotide molecule that consists of a combination of two nucleotide units.
sentences.sContent_eng: A nucleotide molecule that consists of a combination of two nucleotide units.
sentences.sCn: 二核苷酸：两个单核苷酸结合而成的核苷酸分子。

sentences.sContent: A a nucleotide derived from adenosine that occurs in muscle tissue; the major source of energy for cellular reactions.
sentences.sContent_eng: A a nucleotide derived from adenosine that occurs in muscle tissue; the major source of energy for cellular reactions.
sentences.sCn: 肌肉细胞中由腺苷衍生而来的核苷酸，细胞反应的主要能源。

sentences.sContent: It is the particular sequence of the nucleotide blocks along the molecule that encodes the genetic information .
sentences.sContent_eng: It is the particular sequence of the nucleotide blocks along the molecule that encodes the genetic information .
sentences.sCn: 沿着分子核苷酸的特定序列为遗传信息编码。

phrases.pCn: 核苷酸序列；核酸序列；核苷酸顺序

trans.tranOther: a compound consisting of a nucleoside linked to phosphoric acid
